price: Onipa dasani, bͻ mmͻden paa (di dwuma) a εkͻ wo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ, na nokorε sε wobɛhyia no, (anaasε wobɛhyia wo dwumadie no so akatua, sε εyε papa anaasε bͻne).
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu innaka kādiḥun ilā rabbika kadḥan famulāqīhi
